page.title: 01GAZATEER HIGH ERCALL
page.content: { { { {Welcome to Block:032/00128 0356 0315 {in the county of Shropshire. Position:- Rural area in Shropshire, 8 miles N.E of Shrewsbury and 6 miles N.W of Wellington. The area contains two main villages of High Ercall and Roden. Geography:- The area is approximately 65m.above sea level. The land is mainly covered in agricutural land and woodland.The River Roden flows through the block. Places of Interest:- High Ercall:- ST.Michael and All Angels Church,High Ercall Hall, Toll House, Old Vicarage. Poynton:- Poynton Manor. Outskirts of Area:- Telfords Aqueduct at Longdon_on_Tern, Moreton Corbett Castle
